summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2833 for the improvement of Fifth Avenue West from West Mercer Street to West Roy Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, by making such provisions for the surface drainage as may be necessary, under Ordinance No. 34050, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
